title: Yellow Willow Sapling
info: The Yellow Willow Sapling is a seed purchased from the Zoologist once the Bestiary is 30% complete (157 entries). When planted, it grows into a Yellow Willow tree, which is a tree that can also spawn naturally in the forest. Its appearance is decorative and it functions identically to regular forest trees.
stat:
